# Documentation Request

## Documentation Type

Please select the type of documentation request:

- [ ] **New Tutorial** - Step-by-step guide for a specific task
- [ ] **New Guide** - Comprehensive guide for a topic or service
- [ ] **Reference Documentation** - Technical reference material
- [ ] **Fix/Update** - Correction or update to existing documentation
- [ ] **Example/Code Sample** - New code example or sample
- [ ] **Architecture Documentation** - System design or pattern documentation
- [ ] **Best Practices** - Operational or implementation best practices
- [ ] **Other** - Please specify below

## Description

### What documentation is needed?

### Target Audience

<!-- Who will use this documentation? (e.g., data engineers, architects, beginners) -->

### Current State

<!-- If this is an update/fix, describe the current state of the documentation -->

### Desired Outcome

<!-- What should the documentation achieve? What should users be able to do after reading it? -->

## Priority/Impact

### Priority Level

- [ ] **Critical** - Blocking issue or major gap
- [ ] **High** - Important for common use cases
- [ ] **Medium** - Useful but not urgent
- [ ] **Low** - Nice to have

### Impact Assessment

<!-- How many users will benefit from this documentation? -->

- [ ] **High Impact** - Affects majority of users
- [ ] **Medium Impact** - Affects specific user groups
- [ ] **Low Impact** - Affects small subset of users

### Preferred Format

- [ ] Step-by-step tutorial
- [ ] Conceptual guide
- [ ] API/technical reference
- [ ] Diagram or visual guide
- [ ] Code examples with explanations
- [ ] Video/multimedia content
- [ ] No preference
